pullRequest.title: Add AsyncRunner.runAsync utility
pullRequest.bodyText:
Commits
commit e11eda0
Add utility 'AsyncRunner' to avoid returning null in a completableFuture
exceptionally block.

commit 5468f7f
Replace usages of CompletableFuture.runAsync with AsyncRunner.runAsync

commit.message: Add utility 'AsyncRunner' to avoid returning null in a completableFuture exceptionally block.
Replace usages of CompletableFuture.runAsync with AsyncRunner.runAsync

nodes.bodyText: The case of "Async" is inconsistent with all the other test names
